attributes.action: hold a referendum on the European Union Brussels Treaty signed on 23 June 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Treaty alters the way in which the United Kingdom is governed.   In a democracy the people are sovereign and it is they that should determine how they are governed, not politicians, who have a vested interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
